org.fife.ui.rtextarea

Enum CaretStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<CaretStyle>
      • org.fife.ui.rtextarea.CaretStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CaretStyle>

    public enum CaretStyle
extends java.lang.Enum<CaretStyle>
    Provides various ways to render a caret such as ConfigurableCaret.. Currently supported renderings include:
    1. As a vertical line (like DefaultCaret)
    2. As a slightly thicker vertical line (like Eclipse)
    3. As an underline
    4. As a "block caret"
    5. As a rectangle around the current character
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Robert Futrell
